title: FS: 1913 Walter Johnson Frederic Schutz RPPC & C.1907 J.A. Broatch Postcard
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: 1913 Walter Johnson Frederic Schutz RPPC & C.1907 J.A. Broatch Postcard
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,

Available for sale is a 1913 Frederic Schutz Real Photo Postcard of Walter Johnson. I've seen the Schutz postcard of Wojo by himself, but not this version! Other than being postally used this RPPC is in beautiful condition, just some minor wear, nice gloss and no creases! Price is [STRIKE]$975.00[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$850.00 [/STRIKE]$800.00 paypal FF including shipping, tracking and insurance from Canada. 

Also for sale is a C.1907 J.A. Broatch postcard of The Oval in Worcester, MA. Hall of famer Jesse Burkett owned the team that played here. Price is $35.00 paypal FF including regular shipping. Tracking & insurance will cost extra for this postcard.

PM or post if interested and thanks for looking!
nice postcard showing some Walter Johnson history

Thanks Ed!
If anyone is interested in these fine postcards shoot me an offer, I have some wiggle room on these!
Jeff
I'll drop the Wojo to $850 and the other postcard to $30.00.
Can do $800 delivered on the Wojo!
